overview: 16 Filmmaking Teams created a broken-telephone-narrative over the course of 16 Weeks. Each team could view only the sequence that came before theirs. Together, the collective created a sprawling DIY epic! A movie that morphs rapidly before your very eyes! An ambitious community project formed in the midst of fractured isolation! Together, they created... “Insomniac: The Movie”!
tagline: A COLLABORATIVE QUARANTINE COMMUNITY CINEMA PROJECT
title: Insomniac: The Movie
